Package cams.filter

Interface FilterStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
FilterByDate, FilterByLocation, FilterByName, FilterByStaff, FilterByUserGroup, FilterByVisibility
public interface FilterStrategy
The interface for filtering a list of camps. A FilterStrategy represents a specific strategy used to filter a list of camps. This strategy can be by visibility, location, name, etc.
Since:
2023-11-23
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Camp>
    filter(List<Camp> camps)
    Filters the list of camps provided using this filter strategy and returns the result.
    void
    setCriteria(Object criteria)
    Sets the filter criteria for this filter strategy.
    String
    toString()
    Returns a string representation of this filter strategy, which consists of the filter strategy and the criteria separated by a colon.

  • Method Details

    • setCriteria

      void setCriteria(Object criteria)
      Sets the filter criteria for this filter strategy. An implementation should downcast this criteria object to the type needed for that filter strategy.
      Parameters:
      criteria - the filter criteria

    • filter

      List<Camp> filter(List<Camp> camps)
      Filters the list of camps provided using this filter strategy and returns the result.
      Parameters:
      camps - list of camps to be filtered
      Returns:
      filtered list of camps

    • toString

      String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this filter strategy, which consists of the filter strategy and the criteria separated by a colon.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the string representation
